channel.title: Can't run 317 Clients
channel.description:
When i click run.bat it says "Windows cant find "javaw" make sure you typed the name correctly,and then try again" and in the cmd "Quote: 'Quote:' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable problem or batch file"
Quote: @echo off Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
is my run.bat I have windows VISTA! if that helps at all

item.title: Can't run 317 Clients
item.dc:creator: @dragon39990 dragon39990
item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

I did that and it still is not working says “windows can’t find java…etc.”

Read full topic
